name: Real Virtuality
description:
Often times one feels that their fate is being controlled by someone else. Like some multi-dimensional entity living out there that cannot be seen by us. 

Real Virtuality is about a two dimensional boy whose fate lies within our hands. Control his fate and have fun getting highscores!

This app promotes an #ad-freecampaign. The purpose of this campaign is to relive the ad-free era where developers used to make games for the fun of everyone without those annoying ads.

You can support the developer and the #ad-freecampaign by buying a coffee on kofi:
https://ko-fi.com/iamnexxed
